abstract: Google said general searches for the term “bedbugs” have increased 83 percent in the last year and 182 percent in the last four weeks.
snippet: Google said general searches for the term “bedbugs” have increased 83 percent in the last year and 182 percent in the last four weeks.
lead_paragraph: As people across the nation try to eradicate bedbugs from the crevices of their homes, a battle is being waged online among pest control companies over whose ad will be the first one most people see as they race to the Internet to learn about these insidious pests.

headline.main: A Pitched Battle Over Bedbugs in Online Search Advertising
headline.print_headline: A Pitched Battle Over Bedbugs in Online Search Advertising
